landing.bio: I am very passionate about software development and artificial intelligence. My tech stack includes Python , Machine Learning and Javascript. Python for server side and scripting and Javascript for the frontend.

experience.organization: Center for Ubiquitous Computing, University of Oulu, Finland

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a Software Enginer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter here in Finland I enjoy to go gym and play indoor games. During the warmer months here in Finland, I enjoy fishing, exploring trails near my area.
interests.paragraphTwo: I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology.

projects.paragraphOne: We developed a chat bot that identifies the arguments employed by chatters while having conversation with chat bot to support chatters claims using advanced text analysis techniques
projects.paragraphTwo: We developed a web application where a user can create their own dashboards to track different events in a specific area using React.js, Nodejs and Next.js framework.
projects.paragraphThree: As a part of my thesis I have developed a web application for detecting events from twitter in real time using python programming and Flask framework
